Submodules¶

google.cloud.security.inventory.api_map module¶

Map of the APIs needed by the inventory pipelines.

google.cloud.security.inventory.errors module¶

Errors for Inventory.

exception google.cloud.security.inventory.errors.Error[source]¶

Bases: exceptions.Exception

Base error class for Inventory.

exception google.cloud.security.inventory.errors.LoadDataPipelineError[source]¶

Bases: google.cloud.security.inventory.errors.Error

Error in the data loading pipeline.

google.cloud.security.inventory.inventory_loader module¶

Loads requested data into inventory.

Usage:
$ forseti_inventory
–forseti_config (optional)
To see all the dependent flags:
$ forseti_inventory –helpfull
google.cloud.security.inventory.inventory_loader.main(_)[source]¶

Runs the Inventory Loader.

Args:
_ (list): args that aren’t used

google.cloud.security.inventory.pipeline_builder module¶

Builds the inventory pipelines to run, and in the correct order to run.

class google.cloud.security.inventory.pipeline_builder.PipelineBuilder(cycle_timestamp, inventory_configs, global_configs, api_map, dao_map)[source]¶

Bases: object

Inventory Pipeline Builder.

build()[source]¶

Build the pipelines to load data.

Returns:
list: List of pipelines instances that will be run.
class google.cloud.security.inventory.pipeline_builder.PipelineNode(resource_name, enabled, parent=None)[source]¶

Bases: anytree.node.NodeMixin

A custom anytree node with pipeline attributes.

More info at anytree’s documentation. http://anytree.readthedocs.io/en/latest/apidoc/anytree.node.html

google.cloud.security.inventory.pipeline_requirements_map module¶

Map of the requirements needed by the inventory pipelines.

google.cloud.security.inventory.util module¶

Common utilities to assist in inventory pipelines.

google.cloud.security.inventory.util.can_inventory_groups(configs)[source]¶

A simple function that validates required inputs to inventory groups.

Args:
The input flags converted to a dict.
Returns:
Boolean
google.cloud.security.inventory.util.list_resource_pipelines()[source]¶

Prints resources (keys) in the pipeline REQUIREMENTS_MAP (dict).

Module contents¶

Exercises Google Cloud APIs to build & store an inventory of an organization.

For more information, please see README.md file in this package.
